Workflow.Name: Review Hub - Copy Users From Old Group to New Group
Workflow.Description:
This flow copies users from the security groups of the old access to the new security groups for access control, ensuring any new users who go through the old access control method can still get access to the application.
Flow Failure would result in users who still utilized the old access method during the period of failure would not gain access to the application.
